A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pretty good not great. Excellent visuals\, good story that plodded at times though\, and hit and miss humour. And amazingingly awkward but awesome Luke drinking some boob milk scene.\n\nSad to see this movie getting trashed by guys who need to get out their parent's basements and others who are crying because they had a preconceived notion of what this movie would be. Waaahhhh go cry a river.
